channel.title: Porject czar shop managing
channel.description:
why is it every time i make a new shop on the base source project czar it always laggs out like i put in a different npc like i put in a brand new shop and i pt everything in correctly and when i press the trade button it laggs me out can anyone help i can never manage to add shops with project czar i lag out then i get this error on my runserver
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -15 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17847) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16592) at client.packetSending(client.java:16561) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
Thanks

item.title: Porject czar shop managing
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

why is it every time i make a new shop on the base source project czar it always laggs out
like i put in a different npc like i put in a brand new shop and i pt everything in correctly and when i press the trade button it laggs me out
can anyone help i can never manage to add shops with project czar
i lag out then i get this error on my runserver

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -15 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17847) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16592) at client.packetSending(client.java:16561) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
